fields.summary: Android: Synchronize the google play services jar files in ti.cloudpush 3.3.0

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
ti.cloudpush has been updated with google-play-services.jar that is the same version as ti.map 2.1.4 

ti.cloudpush is now at version 3.3.0 and needs to be added to titanium_mobile and releases needs to be updated

comments.body:
master PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/5889
3_3_X PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/5890
titanium_releases updated to 3.3.1: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_releases/commit/fcdc7109d930cf355919d527a2bb464cf2da67f0
and back to 3.3.0: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_releases/commit/c08a092a360954ba19b14b8b366dce34543fefdc

Verified on:
Mac OSX 10.9.4
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407031747
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.v20140708132513
Titanium CLI, build: 3.3.0-rc4
Alloy: 1.4.0-rc4
Ti.Cloudpush: 3.3.0
Ti.Map: 2.1.4

Cloudpush and Map can be included into the same project without conflicting google-play-services.jar files.
Closing.
